Verses: 1 janangal Ellaarum Thanneervaasalukku Munnaana Veedhiyile Orumanappattuk Koodi, Karththar Isravelukkuk Karpiththa Moseyin Nyaayappramaana Pusthagaththaik Konduvaravendumendru Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraavukku Sonnaargal.
2 appadiye Ezhaam Maadham Mudhalthedhiyil Aasaariyanaagiya Esraa Nyaayappramaanaththaip Purusharum Sthreegalum, Kettu Ariyaththakka Anaivarumaagiya Sabaikku Munbaagak Konduvandhu,

3 thanneer Vaasalukku Munnaana Veedhikku Edhireyirundhu Kaalamethodangi Maththiyaanamattum Purusharukkum Sthreegalukkum, Kettu Ariyaththakka Matravargalukkum Munbaaga Adhai Vaasiththaan; Sagala Janangalum Nyaayappramaana Pusthagaththirku Gavanamaai Sevikoduththaargal.

4 vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraa Adharkendru Maraththaal Seyyappatta Oru Prasangapeedaththinmel Nindraan; Avanandaiyil Avanukku Valadhupakkamaaga Maththiththiyaavum, Semaavum, Anaayaavum, Uriyaavum, Ilkkiyaavum, Maaseyaavum, Avanukku Idadhupakkamaagap Pedhaayaavum, Meesavelum, Malkiyaavum, Asoomum, Aspadhaanaavum, Sagariyaavum, Mesullaamum Nindraargal.
5 esraa Sagala Janangalukkum Uyaranindru, Sagala Janangalum Kaanap Pusthagaththaith Thirandhaan; Avan Adhaiththirandhapodhu, Janangal Ellaarum Ezhundhunindraargal.

6 appozhudhu Esraa Magaththuvamulla Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Sthoththiriththaan; Janangalellaarum Thangal Kaigalaik Kuviththu, Adharku Marumozhiyaaga, Aamen Aamen Endru Solli, Kunindhu, Mugankuppuravizhundhu, Karththaraip Panindhukondaargal.

7 yesuvaa, Paani, Serebiyaa, Yaamin, Akkoop, Sapedhaayi, Odhiyaa, Maaseyaa, Kelidhaa, Asariyaa, Yosabaadh, Aanaan, Pelaayaa Enbavargalum, Leviyarum, Nyaayappramaanaththai Janangalukku Vilangappanninaargal; Janangal Thangal Nilaiyile Nindraargal.
8 avargal Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanap Pusthagaththai Theerkkamaaga Vaasiththu, Arththancholli, Vaasiththadhai Avargalukku Vilangappanninaargal.

9 janangal Ellaarum Nyaayappramaanaththin Vaarththaigalaik Kettapodhu, Azhudhapadiyaal Thirshaadhaa Ennappatta Negemiyaavum, Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraa Ennum Aasaariyanum, Janangalukku Vilakkikkaattina Leviyarum Sagala Janangalaiyum Nokki: Indha Naal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Parisuththamaana Naal; Neengal Dhukkappadavum Azhavum Vendaam Endraargal.

10 pinnum Avan Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Poik Kozhumaiyaanadhaip Pusiththu, Madhuramaanadhaik Kudiththu, Ondrumillaadhavargalukkup Pangugalai Anuppungal; Indha Naal Nammudaiya Aandavarukkup Parisuththamaana Naal, Visaarappadavendaam; Karththarukkul Magizhchchiyaayiruppadhe Ungaludaiya Belan Endraan.
11 leviyarum Janangalaiyellaam Amarththi: Azhaadhirungal, Indha Naal Parisuththamaana Naal, Visaarappadavendaam Endraargal.
12 appozhudhu Janangal Ellaarum Thangalukku Arivikkappatta Vaarththaigalai Unarndhukondapadiyaal, Pusiththuk Kudikkavum, Pangugalai Anuppavum, Migundha Sandhosham Kondaadavum Ponaargal.
13 marunaalil Janaththin Sagala Vamsaththalaivarum, Aasaariyarum, Leviyarum, Nyaayappramaanaththin Vaarththaigalai Arindhukollavendum Endru Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraavinidaththil Koodi Vandhaargal.

14 appozhudhu Nyaayappramaanaththile, Isravel Puththirar Ezhaam Maadhaththin Pandigaiyile Koodaarangalil Kudiyirukkavendum Endru Karththarmoseyaikkondu Karpiththa Kaariyam Ezhudhiyirukkiradhaik Kandaargal.

15 aagaiyaal Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi Koodaarangalaip Podumpadikku, Neengal Malaigalukkup Purappattuppoi Olivakkilaigalaiyum, Kaattu Olivakkilaigalaiyum, Mirudhu Sedigalin Kilaigalaiyum, Pereechcha Mattaigalaiyum, Adarndhamarakkilaigalaiyum Konduvaarungalendru Thangaludaiya Sagala Pattanangalilum, Erusalemilum Koorip Prasiththappaduththinaargal.

16 appadiye Janangal Veliyepoi Avaigalaik Konduvandhu, Avaravar Thangal Veedugalmelum, Thangal Mutrangalilum, Dhevanudaiya Aalayappraagaarangalilum, Thanneervaasal Veedhiyilum, Eppiraayeem Vaasal Veedhiyilum Thangalukkuk Koodaarangalai Pottaargal.

17 indhappragaaramaaga Siraiyiruppilirundhu Thirumbi Vandhavargalin Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Koodaarangalaippottu, Koodaarangalil Kudiyirundhaargal; Ippadiye Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavin Naatkalmudhal Annaalmattum Isravel Puththirar Seyyaadhirundhu Ippozhudhu Seydhapadiyaal, Migundha Sandhoshamundaayirundhadhu.

18 mudhalaam Naal Thodangik Kadaisinaalmattum, Dhinamdhinam Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaana Pusthagam Vaasikkappattadhu; Ezhunaal Pandigaiyai Aasariththaargal; Ettaamnaalovenil, Muraimaiyinpadiye Viseshiththa Aasarippu Naalaayirundhadhu.
